dc:title: On Pilgrimage - November 1963
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Stays with newly forming community of families while on a speaking trip to England and recalls Peter Maurin's agronomic vision and support for the family farm.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 809 1963-11-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
